name: Spook and Thunder
description:
Spook and thunder 

The storm is here. It caught up to us. And the only way to stop it, is to destroy the eye of the storm. Can you overcome the rain? Can you break throw the wind? Can you resist the thunder? Can you conquer the storm?

Spook and thunder is a top-down shooter with a focus on:

  • Creepy atmosphere
  • Ambient sound effects
  • Many different enemies

The player can shoot, dash and throw grenades, while dodging enemies and traversing throw the stormy terrain.
